timeline.bodyText: @vzurauskas can you introduce a SortedSetEnvelope (that extends SetEnvelope) responsible of delegating to a wrapped set and have Sorted only responsible of handling the Iterable-based constructor.
timeline.author: victornoel

- *  wrapped set. Some tests must be added for it.
  */
-public final class Sorted<T> extends SetEnvelope<T> {
+@SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneConstructorShouldDoInitialization")
+public final class Sorted<T> extends SetEnvelope<T> implements SortedSet<T> {

timeline.bodyText: @vzurauskas I think you can use directly IsEqual with a new SetOf.

replies.bodyText: @victornoel It will ignore order, since normal sets are unordered. I need to make sure the order is right here.
